entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 800 metres in the afternoon.
